select b.billiard_id,m.member_price as member_price,u.user_price as user_price from (select distinct billiard_id from accounts where account_status = 2 or account_status=3)b
left join
(select billiard_id,sum(price) as member_price from accounts where account_status = 2 group by billiard_id)m
on b.billiard_id = m.billiard_id
left join
(select billiard_id,sum(price) as user_price from accounts where account_status = 3 group by billiard_id)u on b.billiard_id = u.billiard_id
